items.question: How do I reset my password?
items.answer: Go to the Login page and click Forgot Password. Enter your email to receive a reset code, then set a new password on the Reset Password page.

items.question: Why must I verify my email?
items.answer: Email verification helps protect your account and ensures you receive notifications about your complaints.

items.question: How do I submit a complaint?
items.answer: Navigate to Complaints â†’ Create, fill in the form with details and optional attachments, then submit. You can track progress on the My Complaints page.

items.question: How will I get status updates?
items.answer: You will receive notifications under the Notifications page and via email if enabled.

items.question: How is my data used?
items.answer: We use your data to process complaints, notify you of updates, and improve the service. See the Privacy Policy for details.
